definedIn._instruction: Add one or several files in which this parcellation terminology is stored in.
definedIn.description: Reference to a file instance in which something is stored.
definedIn.title: definedIn

fullName._instruction: Enter a descriptive full name for this parcellation terminology.
fullName.description: Whole, non-abbreviated name of something or somebody.
fullName.title: fullName

isAlternativeVersionOf._instruction: Add one or several alternative versions to this parcellation terminology.
isAlternativeVersionOf.description: Reference to an original form where the essence was preserved, but presented in an alternative form.
isAlternativeVersionOf.title: isAlternativeVersionOf

isNewVersionOf._instruction: Add the earlier version of this parcellation terminology.
isNewVersionOf.description: Reference to a previous (potentially outdated) particular form of something.
isNewVersionOf.title: isNewVersionOf

ontologyIdentifier._instruction: Enter the identifier (IRI) of the related ontological term matching this parcellation terminology.
ontologyIdentifier.description: Term or code used to identify something or someone registered within a particular ontology.
ontologyIdentifier.title: ontologyIdentifier

shortName._instruction: Enter a descriptive short name for this parcellation terminology.
shortName.description: Shortened or fully abbreviated name of something or somebody.
shortName.title: shortName

versionIdentifier._instruction: Enter the version identifier of this parcellation terminology.
versionIdentifier.description: Term or code used to identify the version of something.
versionIdentifier.title: versionIdentifier

versionInnovation._instruction: Enter a short description of the novelties/peculiarities of this parcellation terminology.
versionInnovation.description: Documentation on what changed in comparison to a previously published form of something.
versionInnovation.title: versionInnovation
